title: ASUS Chromebox 3 Revealed: The Mac mini rival we've always wanted?
description: ![Chromebox3]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Stepping up to £449.99 model gets you an i3-7100U CPU, and 64GB of storage.The £569.99 Chromebox 3 ups the CPU from an i3 to an i5-8250U, bumps the RAMto 8GB, and increases the total storage to 128GB.At the top of the range you can expect an Intel Core i7-8550U, 16GB of RAM and256GB of storage. This would put the Chromebox 3 firmly into decent gaming PCterritory, were it not for the lack of a dedicated graphics card and anoperating system that will run mobile games at best.**Related:[Best laptops](https://www.trustedreviews.com/guide/best-laptops)**With specs like these the Chromebox 3 is shaping up to be a nice littlemachine for light productivity work, as well as being a decent media streamingmachine.The launch of the Chromebox 3 comes as Apple fans continue to hope for a newversion of the cult favourite Mac mini.[Back in October](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/apple-mac-mini-may-not-dead-3311789), an email allegedly sent to a user saw Apple CEO Tim Cook pledgethe diminutive desktop was still “an important part of our product line goingforward.” At the time, Cook reportedly said it wasn’t the right time to sharemore details.**Would you consider the Chromebox 3 as a handy desktop companion? Drop us aline @TrustedReviews on Twitter.**
